contents.title: Subwatch
contents.description: Turn subscription chaos into financial harmony.

hero.title: Turn subscription chaos into financial harmony

features.title: Understand easily
features.description: Understand your whole subscription chaos at a glance.

features.title: Powerful insights
features.description: Get the right insights to make a decision. From monthly distribution, alerts before renewal, and the information you need in a tightly beautiful way.

features.title: Secure
features.description: All the data is stored localy, and your're the only one who can access it. Backup and restore from a local file, your data will never leave your machine.

features.title: Fast & easy
features.description: Add subscriptions data automagically with one click right from your Gmail.

steps.description: When you view an email inside of Gmail click the 'Subwatch' button.
The menu will open up with all the fields pre-populated (you can edit them).
Click 'add subscription' to add it to the subwatch extension.

items.quote: I've tried several subscription trackers, but Subwatch stands out with its seamless integration and easy-to-navigate interface. It not only alerts me about upcoming bills but also suggests optimizations, turning my subscription management from chaos to harmony. Highly recommend!

Subwatch has transformed how I manage my subscriptions. With its intuitive design and proactive alerts, I've saved money by canceling subscriptions I no longer need. Check it out at https://subwatch.co for a stress-free subscription experience.

Ever since I started using Subwatch, my subscription management has been on autopilot. It's easy to use, and the reminders are a lifesaver. If you're looking to take control of your subscriptions look no further.
Subwatch has made managing my subscriptions a breeze. No more surprise charges or forgotten renewals. The dashboard is informative, and the alerts are timely.

The simplicity of Subwatch is what makes it so effective. It gives me a real-time overview of my subscriptions, which has been crucial in budgeting. Alerts for renewals mean I can decide whether to continue or cancel with just a few clicks. Definitely a must-have for anyone looking to streamline their financial management.

Subwatch is a lifesaver! I've been able to keep track of all my subscriptions without having to dig through emails. The price alerts have been particularly helpful.
Wow, Subwatch really simplifies subscription management. Definitely recommending this to everyone I know!

items.label: Is there a free trial?
items.content: No, there isn't. The softwere is a one time payment of $7.99 and it's yours for life.

items.label: How can I backup my data?
items.content: There is no cloud backup at the moment. If you're about to delete the extension we recommand to go to settings -> download backup file.

items.label: Do you support monthly and yearly subscriptions?
items.content: Yes, we can analyze both monthly and yearly subscriptions.

items.label: Is my data shared with anyone?
items.content: No. The extension save the data localy on your machine and the data is not shared with anyone (not even us) or move to any other location.

items.label: Do you offer support?
items.content: Yes. If you have any questions or encounter some difficulties you can DM @nirgn975 on X, or send us an email at support[@]subwatch.co .
